idea:
CFMS provides Integrated Facility Management Services and Manpower Outsourcing (Temporary Staffing) service solutions to the industry, which are most essential for vibrant and cost-effective functioning of every organization.  We have been emerged as trusted and reliable service partners across the business segments in India.

 

Over the years, we have understood our important markets, which have enabled us to influence business prospects across geographies.  Over the years our brand has become synonymous with trust and reliability.  With our experience and operational efficiency, we are addressing varied and dynamic business requirements of our clients from all Industrial and Business Sectors.

 

Our focus is on developing customer relationship and engagement through integrated service solutions model.  Involvement of Technology and single point contact system has created seamless communication experience to our customers this has helped us to drive high customer retention.  At the same time, we are continuously growing our market share with Organic & Inorganic business growth.
name: COMFORT FACILITY MANAGEMENT SERVICES LLP
